snippet: With Rick Santorum poised to do well in the Minnesota caucuses, the Romney campaign issues statements attacking him on spending.
abstract: Mitt Romney shifts his attacks to Republican presidential contender Rick Santorum, who appears poised to do well in several upcoming primaries in the Midwest; criticizes Santorum for his federal spending and health care policies in effort to eliminate rival that could possibly threaten Romney's march to win the nomination.
lead_paragraph: With Rick Santorum poised to do well in the Minnesota caucuses, the Romney campaign issues statements attacking him on spending.

headline.seo: Heading Midwest, Romney Takes Aim at Santorum
headline.main: As Campaign Heads to Midwest, Romney Turns His Focus to Santorum
headline.print_headline: As Campaign Heads to Midwest, Romney Turns His Focus to Santorum
